notes.text:
This update for Mesa fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-5068: Fixed exploitable shared memory permissions vulnerability (bsc#1156015).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An exploitable shared memory permissions vulnerability exists in the functionality of X11 Mesa 3D Graphics Library 19.1.2. An attacker can access the shared memory without any specific permissions to trigger this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVE description

recommended: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 12 SP5:libxatracker-devel-1.0.0-104.9.49.s390x

remediations.details: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
